sentence: We upgraded to a corner room which was spacious and really nice with a great view of the pool Ideally located that we Ubered to Del Friscos for dinner and stayed at the hotel because of their fun bar with dance floor
We also ordered room service breakfast
Great views spotless rooms friendly helpful staff restaurant was excellent and Spa is recommended
We often book this Omni for its wonderful location near the Galleria area and some of our favorite restaurants
The Noe restaurant breakfast buffet was outstanding and so was their service
Location central to excellent shopping and dining and centrally located for activities in different areas of Houston
Best Thanksgiving buffet
The staff is amazing from the valet concierge housekeeping servers at breakfast everyone is pleasant and always smiling
I loved the breakfast buffets and found the wait staff to be very attentive
We ate all our meals there and the staff were nice
The chef there makes some delicious dishes
The breakfast buffet was lacking compared to some other Omni hotels I usually stay at but that is just really a minor complaint
No breakfast no parking vouchers
Multiple bars one being a whiskey bar
Breakfast service needs up its game very slow
Room was not to my satisfaction as one of the main lights did n’t work and the coffee had no creamer available so had to go to restaurant for a cup of coffee
Also there was no fine dining for dinner

There was no refrigerator in the room so forget saving leftovers from restaurants there was no vending machines that we could find to get a drink either on our floor or in the lobby and the hotel store always seemed to be closed or out of what we needed the ice machine on our floor was in some kind of janitors closet with wires from some kind of electrical box sticking out behind it and it was an old school ice machine that had a scoper on a chain instead of just pushing a button like newer ice machines
I come back from dinner only to find out that I ’m locked out of my room so I have to go get a new card
I was however disappointed with the size of the room service menu and that my son was not given the activity backpack or the cookies and milk service at night
